definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: The unit of heat we shall use most frequently is the kilocalorie.
sentences.chinese: 我們最常用的熱量單位是千卡。

sentences.english: Every kilograms of weight is 35 kilocalorie the least.
sentences.chinese: 每公斤體重最少爲35千卡。

sentences.english: It is said that this horse ambition ascend kilocalorie Si.
sentences.chinese: 據說這一匹馬就要上千卡斯。

sentences.english: The average daily dietary intake of calories is 2952 kcal per person.
sentences.chinese: 罪犯每人每天從食品中攝取的熱量爲2952千卡。

sentences.english: Intake per day is about about 1000000 cards.
sentences.chinese: 每一天的攝取量大約是1000千卡左右。

sentences.english: Drink 1 liter per 1000 calories you expend.

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
